data.SOURCE:
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'Dekont Açıklamasına göre kayıt'
@Metadata.ignorePropagatedAnnotations: true
define root view entity YEHO_DDL_I_RULES
  as select from yeho_t_rules
{
  key companycode                   as Companycode,
  key itemno                        as Itemno,
      account_no_102                as AccountNo102,
      transaction_type              as TransactionType,
      tax_number                    as TaxNumber,
      iban                          as Iban,
      documentitemtext              as Documentitemtext,
      debit_credit_indicator        as DebitCreditIndicator,
      document_type                 as DocumentType,
      specialglcode                 as Specialglcode,
      customer                      as Customer,
      supplier                      as Supplier,
      account_no                    as AccountNo,
      arbitrage_account_no          as ArbitrageAccountNo,
      currency                      as Currency,
      documentitemtext_1            as Documentitemtext1,
      documentitemtext_2            as Documentitemtext2,
      documentreferenceid           as Documentreferenceid,
      accountingdocumentheadertext  as Accountingdocumentheadertext,
      assignmentreference           as Assignmentreference,
      paymentmethod                 as Paymentmethod,
      paymentterms                  as Paymentterms,
//      creditcontrolarea             as Creditcontrolarea,
      costcenter                    as Costcenter,
      orderid                       as Orderid,
      profitcenter                  as Profitcenter,
      wbselementinternalid          as Wbselementinternalid,
      personnelnumber               as Personnelnumber,
      reference1idbybusinesspartner as Reference1idbybusinesspartner,
      reference2idbybusinesspartner as Reference2idbybusinesspartner,
      reference3idbybusinesspartner as Reference3idbybusinesspartner,
      taxcode                       as Taxcode,
      businessplace                 as Businessplace
}
